column4: the | symble is know as a pipe. its a really fast way to pass stuff arround ... for instance    ls | grep -F .jpeg | tee record.txt | xargs --verbose -I X convert X -resize 456x345 bobsoutput/X.png     would be an example of bulk processing and converting jpeg images
Thanks. I was looking for a name for it.^^ I will see if I can find a tutorial on how to use it
the linux pipe is so simple i would be supprized if there is a manual for it ....   it just pipes stdout from one program to stdin of another program
